changelog.title: Learning Path Fix
changelog.description: Fixed 'presentation not available' error when opening Python and other applet-based content from learning paths.

changelog.title: HTML Audit Report
changelog.description: New HTML audit report generator with Nagios-style dashboard showing content health across all houses.

changelog.title: Audit System
changelog.description: Automated audit scripts to detect content gaps, missing categories, and broken links before deployment.

changelog.title: Shield House Categories
changelog.description: Fixed category filtering for 90+ Shield House entries - all content now appears in proper category views.
